      • isIgnoreDeactivatedInputs

        public boolean isIgnoreDeactivatedInputs()
        If true, the run will ignore cascading checks for deactivated inputs and run any node, that is not explicitly deactivated. If enabled, the data must be provided externally (or the table is empty)
        Returns:
        if cascading deactivation is ignored
